info.name: apply_object_detector
info.description:
A module that uses an eta.core.learning.ObjectDetector to detect objects in
videos or images

inputs.name: input_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input VideoLabels file to which to add the detections generated by processing video_path

inputs.name: input_image_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input ImageLabels files to which to add the detections generated by processing image_path

inputs.name: input_image_set_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input ImageSetLabels file to which to add the detections generated by processing images_dir

outputs.name: output_labels_path
outputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing the detections generated by processing video_path

outputs.name: video_features_dir
outputs.description: a directory in which to write features for the detected objects in each frame of video_path. If provided, the detector used must support generating features

outputs.name: output_image_labels_path
outputs.description: an ImageLabels file containing the detections generated by processing image_path

outputs.name: image_features_dir
outputs.description: a directory in which to write features for the objects in image_path. If provided, the detector used must support generating features

outputs.name: output_image_set_labels_path
outputs.description: an ImageSetLabels file containing the detections generated by processing images_dir

outputs.name: image_set_features_dir
outputs.description: a directory in which to write features for the objects in the images in images_dir.  If provided, the detector used must support generating features

parameters.name: detector
parameters.description: an eta.core.learning.ObjectDetectorConfig describing the eta.core.learning.ObjectDetector to use

parameters.name: objects
parameters.description: an array of objects describing the labels and confidence thresholds of objects to detect. If omitted, all detections emitted by the detector are used

parameters.name: record_top_k_probs
parameters.description: the number of top-k class probabilities to record for the predictions
